data.name: Voidwalkers: Exodus
data.detailed_description:
Exodus


Your the time has come, Exile. Aemon has woken and his children have taken up arms in form of a rebellion.

They strike at the heart of our civilization, hoping to cripple the Temple of Nine and slay the members of the Council.

It is your duty to lead our people to a new home. Without your assistance, our Empire will surely fall.

The Game


Voidwalkers - Heroes Fall First is a fast-paced first/third-person shooter that takes place in a gorgeous sci-fi environment.

Enter the realm of Inceptum, and view the stories of our ancestors in their fight for superiority.

Choose your side in a battle where the lines between good and evil are blurred, and your actions determine the fate of humanity and the entire Sol system.

Features

  • Assassination - High Priority targets are in the area! Join your friends and compete against AI or player enemies as you attempt to neutralize the target.
  • Assault - Enter a dark zone and attempt to remove the infection plaguing the area.
  • Battle Royale - 100 players enter, but only one group will come out alive. Enter the F.E.V.E.R. dome and fight for honor, glory, and cool clothes!
  • Capture The Core - Capture the enemy's core and return it to your base!
  • Conquest - Multiple hills, multiple teams, lots of AI. How long can you survive in this extended duration game mode?
  • Deathmatch - Classic slayer. Join your friends or enter an all-out free for all in a brutal bloodbath
  • Escape - Escape capture from your enemies. Simulations include free for all and team-based settings.
  • Exodus - Persistent gameplay among the remains of a city of the dead. Build, loot, and survive in a never-ending nightmare!
  • Firefight - Three random objectives on a large battlefield. Join your friends in a race to beat the timer!
  • Gun Game - Be the first to get a kill with every weapon!
  • Hostage Rescue - A V.I.P. has been taken, prisoner! Join your friends and fight players or AI in a race to save the hostage!
  • Infection - Be the last man standing as patient zero cuts a swath through the living!
  • King of The Hill - Capture and hold the hill until you have reached the maximum amount of points!
  • Sabotage - Plant the bomb at bombsite A or bombsite B or defend your sites with your life!
  • Zombies - The nightmare continues as you and your friends attempt to survive for as long as possible in a land of the dead!
  • Unique Weapons
  • Ranking System
    [\list]

data.short_description: Your the time has come, Exile. Aemon has woken and his children have taken up arms in form of a rebellion. They strike at the heart of our civilization, hoping to cripple the Temple of Nine and slay the members of the Council. It is your duty to lead our people to a new home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Further testing required to fully deteramine accurate system requirements.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device
  • Additional Notes: This was based on a very small test group. If you happen to run the game at 60 (or higher) FPS with a better build, please let me know!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game n0d3::Exodus will contain content related to violence. The game is largely based around combat and will eventually contain dismemberment (the loss of limbs). While the players are robots, there will also be gore as there are biological enemies as well. It is possible that dialogue or text could contain graphic language as well.
